DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective single-arm , open-label , multicenter phase I/II trial . The phase I-trial dose-escalation trial determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) pazopanib combination weekly topotecan . The phase II-trial single arm open-label trial ass safety efficacy combination treatment .
